search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Groove.cm (groove-cm.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: You can find the official pricing page for Groove.cm at this URL: [https://groove.cm/plans](https://groove.cm/plans)【3:0†source】.

\+ Send 15,000 email per month

For One Full Year For JUST $1

*   Send 15,000 Emails/Month – That’s 180,000 emails per year to reach, nurture, and sell to your audience.
    

*   Future-Proof Your Business – Even if you don’t have a big list yet, lock in this one-time deal now before it jumps to $49/month.
    

*   No Additional Costs – No hidden fees, no contracts—just pure value for one full year.
    

*   Effortless Email Sending – Create emails using pre-designed templates and send mass broadcasts with ease.
    

*   Seamless List Growth – Capture, segment, and engage without limitations.
    

*   All-in-One Marketing Power – Works inside Groove, so you don’t need extra software.
    

*   Limited Time Offer: Just $1 Today – Once it’s gone, it’s gone for good.
    

Groove.cm Premium+ Enterprise

\+ Send 15,000 email /mo.

promotional_offers.offer_description: One-time payment of $1 for one year of Premium+ Enterprise access.

Oops! Page **Not Found (404 Error)** 🚀
=======================================

Looks like you've hit a digital detour. The page you’re looking for might have been moved, renamed, or simply doesn’t exist anymore. But no worries—we’ll help you get back on track!
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[Get Back on Track](https://groove.cm/page-4)

Here’s **what you can do next**
-------------------------------

*   Check the URL: Make sure the web address you entered is correct—sometimes it’s just a small typo!
    
*   Go Back to Groove.cm: Click [here](https://groove.cm/) to return to the homepage and continue exploring our tools, training, and resources.
    
*   Get Support: If you still can't find what you're looking for, [](https://support.groovetech.io/)[reach out to support](https://support.groovedigital.com/). We're here to help!
